region.description: Geographical Region of the Weather Station

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the current weather data in ISO 8601 format

temperature_2m.description: Current Temperature at 2 meters above ground (Celsius)

relative_humidity_2m.description: Current Relative Humidity at 2 meters above ground (%)

dewpoint_2m.description: Current Dew Point at 2 meters above ground (Celsius)

apparent_temperature.description: Apparent temperature is the perceived feels-like temperature combining wind chill factor, relative humidity and solar radiation (Celsius)

pressure_msl.description: Current Atmospheric Pressure at Mean Sea Level (hPa)

precipitation.description: Total precipitation (rain, showers, snow) sum of the preceding hour (mm)

rain.description: Only liquid precipitation of the preceding hour including local showers and rain from large scale systems (mm)

snowfall.description: Snowfall amount of the preceding hour (cm). For the water equivalent in millimeter, divide by 7. E.g. 7 cm snow = 10 mm precipitation water equivalent

cloud_cover.description: Current total cloud cover as an area fraction (%)

cloud_cover_low.description: Current low level clouds and fog up to 2 km altitude (%)

cloud_cover_mid.description: Current mid level clouds between 2 km and 6 km altitude (%)

cloud_cover_high.description: Current high level clouds above 6 km altitude (

short_wave_radiation.description: Shortwave solar radiation as average of the preceding hour. This is equal to the total global horizontal irradiationin (W/m²)

direct_radiation.description: Direct solar radiation as average of the preceding hour. This is equal to the direct normal irradiation (W/m²)

direct_normal_irradiance.description: Direct solar radiation as average of the preceding hour on the normal plane (W/m²)

diffuse_radiation.description: Diffuse solar radiation as average of the preceding hour (W/m²)

global_tilted_irradiance.description: Total radiation received on a tilted pane as average of the preceding hour. The calculation is assuming a fixed albedo of 20% and in isotropic sky. Please specify tilt and azimuth parameter. Tilt ranges from 0° to 90° and is typically around 45°. Azimuth should be close to 0° (0° south, -90° east, 90° west, ±180 north). If azimuth is set to 'nan', the calculation assumes a horizontal tracker. If tilt is set to 'nan', it is assumed that the panel has a vertical tracker. If both are set to 'nan', a bi-axial tracker is assumed

sunshine_duration.description: Number of seconds of sunshine of the preceding hour per hour calculated by direct normalized irradiance exceeding 120 W/m², following the WMO definition (s)

wind_speed_10m.description: Current Wind Speed at 10 meters above ground (km/h)

wind_speed_100m.description: Current Wind Speed at 100 meters above ground (km/h)

wind_direction_10m.description: Current Wind Direction at 10 meters above ground (degrees)

wind_direction_100m.description: Current Wind Direction at 100 meters above ground (degrees)

wind_gusts_10m.description: Gusts at 10 meters above ground of the indicated hour. Wind gusts in CERRA are defined as the maximum wind gusts of the preceding hour. (km/h)

et0_fao_evapotranspiration.description: ET₀ Reference Evapotranspiration of a well watered grass field. Based on FAO-56 Penman-Monteith equations ET₀ is calculated from temperature, wind speed, humidity and solar radiation. Unlimited soil water is assumed. ET₀ is commonly used to estimate the required irrigation for plants. (mm)

snow_depth.description: Current Snow Depth on the ground (m)

vapor_pressure_deficit.description: Current Vapor Pressure Deificit (VPD) in kilopascal (kPa). For high VPD (>1.6), water transpiration of plants increases. For low VPD (<0.4), transpiration decreases (kPa)

soil_temperature_0_to_7cm.description: Current Average temperature of soil in 0 to 7 cm depth (Celsius)

soil_temperature_7_to_28cm.description: Current Average temperature of soil in 7 to 28 cm depth (Celsius)

soil_temperature_28_to_100cm.description: Current Average temperature of soil in 28 to 100 cm depth (Celsius)

soil_temperature_100_to_255cm.description: Current Average temperature of soil in 100 to 255 cm depth (Celsius)

soil_moisture_0_to_7cm.description: Current volumetric soil moisture content in 0 to 7 cm depth (m³/m³)

soil_moisture_7_to_28cm.description: Current volumetric soil moisture content in 7 to 28 cm depth (m³/m³)

soil_moisture_28_to_100cm.description: Current volumetric soil moisture content in 28 to 100 cm depth (m³/m³)

soil_moisture_100_to_255cm.description: Current volumetric soil moisture content in 100 to 255 cm depth (m³/m³)
